==Details==
===Descriptions===
speedrun.com page will be linked here. Also this will memorialize all first places throughout history.
===Rules=== # Auto-clickers are not allowed # Must have the video recorded in its entirety. # The run starts once you catch your starter. # Shiny% excludes the starter. # Video must end on the Statistics Screen
===Categories===
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Category !! How to finish |- | Kanto Champion% || Beat Blue |- | Mew% || Catch Mew |- | Route 230% || Complete Route 230 |- | Shiny% || Catch 1 Shiny |- | Shiny Dex% || Catch every Shiny |- | Kanto Dex% || Catch the Whole Kanto Dex |- | Millionaire% || Make {{pdollar}}1,000,000 |- |}
===Record History=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Category !! Name !! Time !! Date |- | Kanto Champion% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Mew% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Route 230% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Shiny% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Shiny Dex% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Kanto Dex% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Millionaire% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |}
